metadata.name: ValidationProperty
metadata.description: Provides additional info for smart VO reflections. Should only be set on variables or readwrite properties. Use either empty name or 'remoteName' attribute they have identical functionality. Attribute 'collectionElementType' can accept any Class but for convenient use it takes BaseVO Classes. Attribute 'initializer' is object's method: public function YOUR_NAME(source:*):PROPERTY_TYPE

metadata.name: Ignored
metadata.description: Removes property from smart VO reflections
